instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.A2159: What is A2159? A2159 is a model number for a 13 inch size MacBook Pro Retina from years 2019 with EMC 3301, that may contain one of these boards depending on the year & configuration: 820-01598..

threads.title: Macbook <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A2159</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> TouchBar Flicker and Reboot
threads.message:
Hello,
This Macbook came in for a Display replacement about 6 months ago. Display was replaced and checked and kept. Everything was working.
The client came today to take delivery. We charged it and kept it ready and saw that the touchbar isnt working and the Machine is rebooting in sometime with the black error message the computer restarted because of a problem press any key.

What can be the issue here?

threads.title: Macbook <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A2159</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> TouchBar Flicker and Reboot
threads.message:
Any previous liquid damage reported?
Inspect for corrosion.

threads.title: Macbook <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A2159</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> TouchBar Flicker and Reboot
Macbook <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A2159</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> TouchBar Flicker and Reboot
threads.message:
Test if works disconnecting LCD assembly; use external monitor.
Also check without touchbar connected.

threads.title: Macbook <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A2159</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> TouchBar Flicker and Reboot
threads.message: We had tried a different display assembly to rule out that possibility already. Disconnected the touchbar and it didnt reboot

threads.title: Macbook <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A2159</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> TouchBar Flicker and Reboot
